description: Total number of ICU encounters recorded in the governed ICU data extract. Volume measure for intensive care utilization.
Ratio of observed to expected length of stay, adjusted for case mix. Values >1.0 indicate longer stays than expected; <1.0 indicates shorter.
Risk-adjusted expected length of stay in days, based on case mix and severity. Used as the benchmark for LOS Index calculation.
Average observed length of stay in days across all discharges in the cohort. Raw measure of hospitalization duration.
Variance of inpatient length of stay measured in days for the entity cohort. Represents the spread of LOS around the mean.
Average number of days patients spend in the ICU, sourced from the governed ICU extract. Reflects ICU length of stay intensity.
Percentage of patients who return to the ICU during the same hospitalization. Indicator of care quality and patient stability after ICU discharge.
Percentage of total encounters that include an ICU stay, per the governed ICU extract. Reflects case mix intensity and acuity distribution.
